explains: n. 总部，总公司；司令部，指挥部
wordGroup: general headquarters 陆军总司令部

sentences.en: The warning was radioed to headquarters.
sentences.cn: 通过无线电向总部发出了警报。

sentences.en: They located their headquarters in Swindon.
sentences.cn: 他们把总部设在了斯温登。

sentences.en: I'm waiting for clearance from headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我在等待总部的录用审查许可。
